common.title: Parking e-services
common.name: Name
common.verify-email: Please type your email address again
common.fetched-from-profile: The marked information are shown from your Helsinki Profile.
common.fetched-from-profile-aria: The information shown is from your Helsinki Profile
common.required-fields: Required fields are indicated with a star *
common.helsinki-profile-link: Go to your Helsinki Profile to edit your information.

barcode.label: Virtual barcode
barcode.toast-body: Virtual barcode has been copied to clipboard

ref-number.label: Reference number
ref-number.tooltip-text: You can find the reference number from your parking fine.

invoice-number.label: The invoice number of the compensation decision
invoice-number.tooltip-text: You can find the invoice number in the compensation decision sent to you.

helper-text.common: Enter the registration number as in the parking fine.
helper-text.moved-car: Enter the registration number as in the compensation decision.

fine-info.fine-additional-details: Additional details about the parking fine

errors.notification-title: It is not possible to make a rectification claim
errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Try again later.
errors.default: It is not possible to make a rectification claim in the parking e-services. Contact customer service if needed.

parking-fine.title: Contest to parking fine
parking-fine.submit-success: Rectification claim has been sent successfully

success.label: We have received your rectification claim
success.text: You will receive notifications about the different stages of processing the rectification claim to the email address you have provided. You will receive the decision to parking e-services.

fail.label: Sending the rectification claim failed
fail.text: Something went wrong. Contact customer service if needed.

data-not-found.label: Parking fine was not found
data-not-found.text: Parking fine was not found. Contact customer service if needed.

errors.not-found: Parking fine was not found. Contact customer service if needed.
errors.objection-exists: Rectification claim has already been made to this parking fine. Contact customer service if needed.
errors.note: This is a notice for parking offence. There is no payment. You can not claim rectification to a notice.

due-date.title: Extend the due date of a parking fine by 30 days

allowed.label: You are able to extend the due date
allowed.text: Extending the due date is only possible when the due date has not expired.

not-allowed.label: Extending the due date is not possible.

email-confirmation.label: Email confirmation
email-confirmation.text: Confirmation will be sent to the email address you have provided to Helsinki Profile: {{email}}.

success.label: The due date has now been extended.
success.text: The due date of the parking fine has now been extended by 30 days. The new due date is {{newDueDate}}.

fail.label: Extending the due date has failed.
fail.text: Something went wrong. Contact customer service if needed.

errors.not-found: Parking fine was not found, check the information. Contact customer service if needed.
errors.due-date-past: The due date on the parking fine has expired. You can not extend the due date on the parking e-services. Contact customer service if needed. Parking fine needs to be paid in 30 days.
errors.already-extended: You have already extended the due date on the parking fine. You can extend the due date once on the parking e-service. Contact customer service if needed.
errors.already-paid: It is not possible to extend the due date. The parking fine is fully paid.
errors.default: It is not possible to extend the due date. Contact customer service if needed.

moved-car.title: Claim for rectification for the decision on the reimbursement of vehicle removal costs
moved-car.submit-success: Rectification claim has been sent successfully

success.label: We have received your rectification claim.
success.text: You will receive notifications about the different stages of processing the rectification claim to the email address you have provided. You will receive the decision in the parking e-services.

fail.label: Sending the rectification claim failed.
fail.text: Something went wrong. Contact customer service if needed.

data-not-found.label: Compensation decision was not found
data-not-found.text: Compensation decision was not found. Contact customer service if needed.

moved-car.end-address: The vehicle has been moved to

errors.not-found: Compensation decision not found, check the information. Contact customer service if needed.
errors.objection-exists: Rectification claim has already been made to this compensation decision. Contact customer service if needed.

relation-info.relation: I am making the rectification claim
relation-info.2: as the owner of the vehicle

rectificationForm.to-separate-email: I want the notifications to a different email address
rectificationForm.delivery-decision: I would like the decision to be sent
rectificationForm.byMail: by mail to the provided address

attachments.label: Attachments
attachments.helper-text:
You can attach up to three files. 
Allowed file formats are JPG and PDF. 
The maximum size of an attachment file is 5 megabytes.

attach-poa.label: Attach a power of attorney
attach-poa.helper-text:
You can attach only one file. 
Allowed file formats are JPG and PDF. 
The maximum size of an attachment file is 5 megabytes.

errors.too-many-attachments: You can attach up to three attachments

links.due-date: Extend the due date of a parking fine by 30 days
links.parking-fine: View the parking fine information and make a rectification claim
links.moved-car: View the vehicle transfer information and make a rectification claim

list.title: Rectification claims and parking fine due date extensions

due-date.label: The due date has been extended
due-date.text: The due date of the parking fine has been extended by 30 days. The new due date is {{dueDate}}.

resolvedViaMail.label: Decision has been mailed
resolvedViaMail.text: The decision has been mailed to the address provided in the rectification claim.

list.no-forms: You have not made any rectification claims nor made any extensions to parking fine due dates.

errors.label: Failed to load data
errors.default: Something went wrong. Try again later.
